column1: Sherry joined [[The Tolkien Society]] at the age of thirteen
column2: following the [[BBC]] [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|radio production of ''The Lord of the Rings'']]. He was a regular contributor to many different publications submitting scores of black and white ink illustrations. His art has been published in ''[[The York Shire Post]]''
column5: and [[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'' - for which he did numerous cover drawings.
